channel.title: PLz someone help
channel.description:
I got a dupe/glitch on my server,
i will explain what it is..
when someone trades someone 5M for example...then accept normal but when the person who traded the 5M trades someone else, the 5M is already in trade so they can dupe :(
Can anyone please help me fix?
